com.orbischallenge.game.engine

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orbischallenge.game.engine.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class representing an x and y coordinate pair. Created by Orbis Access (Canada) Ltd. on 09/06/2016.
